law.catch_line: Student participation in program -- Excused absences.

text.section: Recognizing the participation of secondary school students in the Veterans' Service Organization Burial Honor Guard Program, excused absences may be granted by local school boards to students of secondary school JROTC programs or other students who participate in the Veterans' Service Organization Burial Honor Guard Program. This includes time spent training, traveling, and participating in the Veterans' Service Organization Burial Honor Guard Program.
Local school boards may also adopt a policy to allow students to participate in the Veterans' Service Organization Burial Honor Guard Program as a part of the instructional program.

law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 43, sec. 4, effective July 1, 2002.
